PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Hyper Beam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Swift
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Air Slash
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Gust
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Smog
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Acid
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with a spray of harsh acid.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Earth Power
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Mud Bomb
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Mud Shot
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Ancient Power
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Power Gem
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Bug Buzz
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Signal Beam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Hex
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Shadow Ball
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Flash Cannon
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Ember
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with small flames.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Flamethrower
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Lava Plume
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Inferno
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Fire Blast
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Water Gun
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Hydro Pump
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Water Pulse
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Bubble Beam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Bubble
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pok√©mon.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Absorb
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A nutrient-draining attack.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Mega Drain
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A nutrient-draining attack.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Giga Drain
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A nutrient-draining attack.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Magical Leaf
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Leaf Storm
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Solar Beam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Discharge
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Zap Cannon
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Thunder Shock
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Electro Ball
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Thunder
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Thunderbolt
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Confusion
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Psychic
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Psybeam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Extrasensory
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Psywave
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Powder Snow
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Blizzard
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Icy Wind
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Aurora Beam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Ice Beam
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Twister
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pok√©mon.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Dragon Pulse
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Dragon Rage
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Dragon Breath
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Dark Pulse
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Moonblast
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target.

PokeWorld.MoveDef.label: Fairy Wind
PokeWorld.MoveDef.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
